title: Nintendo
description: Nintendo is renowned for its vibrant and dynamic identity, reflected in its color palette which includes shades of black (#0D0C0C), white (#FFFFFF), and grey tones (#A5A2A2, #E5E5E5) symbolizing innovation and technology, with a bold red (#DD2020) signifying excitement and passion. This color scheme is sourced from an online FlipHTML5 document.
